alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 29 at 6:50AM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, areas of snow will continue through mid- morning. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are possible. * WHERE...Cocke Smoky Mountains, Sevier Smoky Mountains and Blount Smoky Mountains Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The blustery winds combined with fresh snow cover will cause blowing and drifting of the snow.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains
